sections.content: I am writing to refer my client, [CLIENT_FULL_NAME] (DOB: [CLIENT_DOB]), for [REASON_FOR_REFERRAL]. [CLIENT_FIRST_NAME] has been my client since [START_DATE] for treatment of [CLIENT_DIAGNOSIS].

During our work together, we have identified a need for the specialized services you provide. I believe your expertise in this area would be of great benefit to [CLIENT_FIRST_NAME] and would complement our ongoing therapeutic work.

I have discussed this referral with [CLIENT_FIRST_NAME], and they have consented to the release of this information to you. Please feel free to contact me at [CLINICIAN_EMAIL] if you require any further information.
Thank you for your time and consideration.
